review:

author: {'steamid': '76561198021324770', 'num_games_owned': 578, 'num_reviews': 63, 'playtime_forever': 155, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 155, 'last_played': 1699302671}
review:
"Mind-bending" puzzle concept that's surprisingly intuitive, calm and free music, relatively easy puzzles and achievements, funny crystal fairy.
The jump voice is very annoying, but you can turn it off.

author: {'steamid': '76561198071914279', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 150, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 150, 'last_played': 1689647625}
review: The concept is cool,but the puzzles are clunky. The biggest problem is that the physics are a bit to clunky for the game to be fun since the puzzles rely on it so heavily. This was a tough vote though.

I wouldnâ€™t really pay for it and I have no motivation to 100% it but itâ€™s not bad for free.

author: {'steamid': '76561198053053976', 'num_games_owned': 310, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 120, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 120, 'last_played': 1613404960}
review: Pretty good game overall, I really like the concept of the game and the creativity that was added to it by putting the crystals in locations that you really have to think to find.  The gimmick of the game is what makes the game fun but I think that this is a game of missed potential, it could have been so much better with more added worlds and other gimmicks that take advantage of the mechanics of the game.  Overall 7/10 I would recommend it to someone who needs to kill and hour or two or is looking for an easy 100%.

author: {'steamid': '76561198042620952', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1382, 'playtime_forever': 278, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 137, 'last_played': 1651335351}
review:
[h1] Genre [/h1] Ein 2D/3D Puzzle Platformer

[h1] Story [/h1] Wir spielen ein Kleines MÃ¤dchen oder einen Jungen (Keine Ahnung) und mÃ¼ssen in 3 Welten jeweils einen GroÃŸen Kristall finden um nach Hause zurÃ¼ckkehren zu kÃ¶nnen

[h1] Gameplay [/h1] Es gibt 3 Welten (Wald, WÃ¼ste, Tundra) wo wir jeweils das Ziel erreichen mÃ¼ssen. Das besondere bei diesem Spiel ist, das man jederzeit zwischen 2D & 3D switchen kann um Kisten & Schiebe RÃ¤tsel zu lÃ¶sen. In jeder Welt gibt es 8-9 Level und in jeden einzelnen Level kann man jeweils einen Kristall finden. Die Level an sich sind nicht allzu schwer aber alle Kristalle zu bekommen ist schon etwas schwieriger

[h1] Achievements [/h1] Es gibt insgesamt 8 Erfolge. Man bekommt alle wenn man das Spiel komplett durchspielt und alle Kristalle einsammelt

[h1] Pro/Contra [/h1]
+ Kostenlos
+ Musik OK
+ Grafik OK
+ Sehr Nette Gameplay Idee mit dem switchen zwischen 2D & 3D
+ Achievements
+ Sammelkarten (droppen aber nicht weil das Spiel Kostenlos ist)
+ XBox 360 Controller Support

[h1] Fazit [/h1] Ein schÃ¶ner Puzzle Platformer bei dem man jederzeit zwischen 2D & 3D hin und her switchen kann um Puzzle zu lÃ¶sen. Eine ganz Nette Idee und die Level machen SpaÃŸ und es ist auch noch Kostenlos. Wer Puzzle Platformer mag, sollte sich dieses Spiel ruhig mal genauer anschauen

review: A cool, clever little game. Bit rough around the edges, but a whole lot of fun to play!
